description: Try our easy to follow Mango & Kaffir Lime Caprioska recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mango & Kaffir Lime Caprioska Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Fill with crushed ice and shake vigorously. Taste and adjust sweetness with a little extra sugar if desired. Pour into two glasses. Serve garnished with slices of lime.
Fill with crushed ice and shake vigorously. Taste and adjust sweetness with a little extra sugar if desired. Pour into two glasses. Serve garnished with slices of lime.
